Sentencas: Operando transmission electron microscopy (TEM) integrated with electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) is applied to the analysis of a model solid oxide electrolysis/fuel cell (SOEC/SOFC).
Titulo: Operando Electron Microscopy and Impedance Analysis of Solid Oxide Electrolysis and Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The cell features electrodes made of gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) and an electrolyte of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ).
Titulo: Operando Electron Microscopy and Impedance Analysis of Solid Oxide Electrolysis and Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Fabricated through pulsed laser deposition (PLD) and subsequent FIB-SEM processing procedures, the model cells were mounted on MEMS chips for operando TEM.
Titulo: Operando Electron Microscopy and Impedance Analysis of Solid Oxide Electrolysis and Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Testing was carried out in an environmental TEM (ETEM) under reactive gases (H2 and H2O) at elevated temperatures relevant for SOEC and SOFC operation and under applied electrical potential.
Titulo: Operando Electron Microscopy and Impedance Analysis of Solid Oxide Electrolysis and Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The activation energies for the YSZ ionic transport and CGO surface reaction were found to be 0.9 and 0.5 eV, respectively, aligning with literature values.
Titulo: Operando Electron Microscopy and Impedance Analysis of Solid Oxide Electrolysis and Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The work demonstrates the feasibility of conducting SOEC/SOFC full cell tests directly within the ETEM, including EIS analysis during cell operation, offering deep insight into the cell contributions: electrochemical reactions, transport, and degradation mechanisms.
Titulo: Operando Electron Microscopy and Impedance Analysis of Solid Oxide Electrolysis and Fuel Cells
